# Seconds in a Minute

> Number of seconds in a minute.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var SECONDS_IN_MINUTE = require( '@stdlib/time/constants/seconds-in-minute' );
```

#### SECONDS_IN_MINUTE

Number of seconds in a minute.

``` javascript
SECONDS_IN_MINUTE === 60;
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

``` javascript
var SECONDS_IN_MINUTE = require( '@stdlib/time/constants/seconds-in-minute' );

console.log( SECONDS_IN_MINUTE );
// => 60
```

</section>
